name: The Arrival
summary_text: Zane, an astronomer, discovers intelligent alien life. But the aliens are keeping a deadly secret, and will do anything to stop Zane from learning it.

name: Grease 2
summary_text: A British student at a 1960s American high school must prove himself to the leader of a girls' gang whose members can only date greasers.

name: Los ojos de Julia
summary_text: The story of a woman who is slowly losing her sight whilst trying to investigate the mysterious death of her twin sister.

name: The Last House on the Left
summary_text: Two teenage girls heading to a rock concert for one's birthday try to score marijuana in the city, where they are kidnapped and brutalized by a gang of psychotic convicts.

name: The Commitments
summary_text: Jimmy Rabbitte, an unemployed Dublin boy, decides to put together a soul band made up entirely of the Irish working class.

name: Jersey Boys
summary_text: The story of four young men from the wrong side of the tracks in New Jersey who came together to form the iconic 1960s rock group The Four Seasons.

name: Drugstore Cowboy
summary_text: A pharmacy-robbing dope fiend and his crew pop pills and evade the law.

name: Find Me Guilty
summary_text: In the late 1980s, a low level gangster named Jackie DiNorscio defends himself in court in what became the longest criminal trial in American judicial history.

name: The Killer Inside Me
summary_text: A West Texas Deputy Sheriff is slowly unmasked as a psychotic killer.

name: A Charlie Brown Christmas
summary_text: Depressed at the commercialism he sees around him, Charlie Brown tries to find a deeper meaning to Christmas.

name: Little Big Man
summary_text: Jack Crabb, looking back from extreme old age, tells of his life being raised by Native Americans and fighting with General Custer.

name: King of New York
summary_text: A drug kingpin is released from prison and seeks to take total control of the criminal underworld in order to give back to the community.

name: The Many Adventures of Winnie the Pooh
summary_text: In this collection of animated shorts based on the stories and characters by A.A. Milne, Winnie the Pooh, a honey-loving teddy bear, embarks on some eccentric adventures.

name: Captain Corelli's Mandolin
summary_text: When a fisherman leaves to fight with the Greek army during World War II, his fiancée falls in love with the local Italian commander.

name: Nosferatu the Vampyre
summary_text: Count Dracula moves from Transylvania to Wismar, spreading the Black Plague across the land. Only a woman pure of heart can bring an end to his reign of horror.

name: The Innkeepers
summary_text: During the final days at the Yankee Pedlar Inn, two employees determined to reveal the hotel's haunted past begin to experience disturbing events as old guests check in for a stay.

name: Kai Po Che
summary_text: Three friends growing up in India at the turn of the millennium set out to open a training academy to produce the country's next cricket stars.

name: Crimea
summary_text: This is a story of love, faith and honor, the strength of spirit and true friendship against the backdrop of the real events of the Crimean spring of 2014.

name: 22 Bullets
summary_text: A retired mobster goes on a revenge spree after being left for dead with 22 bullets in his body by his former childhood friend.

name: This Must Be the Place
summary_text: Cheyenne, a retired rock star living off his royalties in Dublin, returns to New York City to find the man responsible for a humiliation suffered by his recently deceased father during W.W.II.

name: Miracle on 34th Street
summary_text: A lawyer and a little girl must prove that a man claiming to be Santa Claus is the real thing.

name: Drop Dead Gorgeous
summary_text: A small-town beauty pageant turns deadly as it becomes clear that someone will go to any lengths to win.

name: Hollywoodland
summary_text: A detective examines the mysterious death of George Reeves, the star of the television series Adventures of Superman (1952).

name: The War of the Worlds
summary_text: A small town in California is attacked by Martians, beginning a worldwide invasion.

name: Police Academy 5: Assignment: Miami Beach
summary_text: The Police Academy's commandant will be honored at a police convention in Miami Beach. At the airport he picks a wrong bag with stolen diamonds. The "owners" want them back.

name: Nurse Betty
summary_text: Comedy about a widow's post-traumatic obsession with a soap star.

name: Straw Dogs
summary_text: Los Angeles screenwriter David Sumner relocates with his wife to her hometown in the deep South. There, while tensions build between them, a brewing conflict with locals becomes a threat to them both.

name: Single White Female
summary_text: A woman advertising for a new roommate finds that something very strange is going on with the tenant who decides to move in.

name: 6 Souls
summary_text: A forensic psychiatrist discovers that all but one of her patient's multiple personalities are murder victims. She will have to find out what's happening before her time is finished.

name: The Blob
summary_text: A deadly entity from space crashes near a small town and starts to consume anyone in its path. Panic ensues, as shady government scientists try to contain the horrific creature.

name: The Nines
summary_text: A troubled actor, a television show runner, and an acclaimed videogame designer find their lives intertwining in mysterious and unsettling ways.

name: An American Crime
summary_text: The true story of suburban housewife Gertrude Baniszewski, who kept a teenage girl locked in the basement of her Indiana home during the 1960s.

name: Young & Beautiful
summary_text: After losing her virginity, Isabelle takes up a secret life as a call girl, meeting her clients for hotel-room trysts. Throughout, she remains curiously aloof, showing little interest in the encounters themselves or the money she makes.

name: Gully Boy
summary_text: A coming-of-age story based on the lives of street rappers in Mumbai.

name: Barbarella
summary_text: Barbarella, an astronaut from the 41st century, sets out to find and stop the evil scientist Durand Durand, whose Positronic Ray threatens to bring evil back into the galaxy.

name: The Four Feathers
summary_text: A British officer resigns his post just before battle and subsequently receives four white feathers from his friends and fiancee as symbols of what they believe to be his cowardice.

name: Phantasm
summary_text: A teenage boy and his friends face off against a mysterious grave robber, known only as the Tall Man, who employs a lethal arsenal of unearthly weapons.

name: Get Carter
summary_text: A Las Vegas mob enforcer travels back to his hometown to investigate his brother's mysterious death.

name: Better Watch Out
summary_text: On a quiet suburban street, a babysitter must defend a twelve-year-old boy from intruders, only to discover it's far from a normal home invasion.

name: Yahsi Bati
summary_text: In 1881, two Ottoman Secret Agents travel to the USA, at the Sultan's request, to deliver a valuable diamond as a gift for the President.

name: Deep Red
summary_text: A jazz pianist and a wisecracking journalist are pulled into a complex web of mystery after the former witnesses the brutal murder of a psychic.

name: The Way of the Dragon
summary_text: A man visits his relatives at their restaurant in Italy and has to help them defend against brutal gangsters harassing them.

name: Step Up All In
summary_text: All-stars from the previous Step Up installments come together in glittering Las Vegas, battling for a victory that could define their dreams and their careers.

name: The Cooler
summary_text: In an old school Las Vegas casino, its top gambling jinx breaks his curse when he falls in love, much to his boss' consternation.

name: Fools Rush In
summary_text: After a one night stand with Alex, Isabel realizes that she is pregnant and they decide to get married. However, along with the marriage comes compromise of one's own cultural traditions.

name: The Rookie
summary_text: A Texas baseball coach makes the major league after agreeing to try out if his high school team made the playoffs.

name: Osmosis Jones
summary_text: A policeman white blood cell, with the help of a cold pill, must stop a deadly virus from destroying the human they live in, Frank.

name: Les visiteurs
summary_text: A medieval knight and his servant ask a familiar wizard to move them back in time to prevent father-in-law's accidentally killing. Instead, they fly away to the 20th century.

name: Adoration
summary_text: A pair of childhood friends and neighbors fall for each other's sons.

name: Kagemusha
summary_text: A petty thief with an utter resemblance to a samurai warlord is hired as the lord's double. When the warlord later dies the thief is forced to take up arms in his place.

name: Forces of Nature
summary_text: A soon-to-be-married man encounters an exciting stranger after his plane suffers an accident on takeoff.

name: The Secret of Kells
summary_text: A young boy in a remote medieval outpost under siege from barbarian raids is beckoned to adventure when a celebrated master illuminator arrives with an ancient book, brimming with secret wisdom and powers.

name: Shutter
summary_text: A newly married couple discovers disturbing, ghostly images in photographs they develop after a tragic accident. Fearing the manifestations may be connected, they investigate and learn that some mysteries are better left unsolved.

name: Main Hoon Na
summary_text: An army major goes undercover as a college student. His mission is both professional and personal: to protect his general's daughter from a radical militant, and to find his estranged half-brother.

name: After the Wedding
summary_text: A manager of an orphanage in India is sent to Copenhagen, Denmark, where he discovers a life-altering family secret.

name: Alex Cross
summary_text: A homicide detective is pushed to the brink of his moral and physical limits as he tangles with a ferociously skilled hired killer who specializes in torture and pain.

name: Frequently Asked Questions About Time Travel
summary_text: While drinking at their local pub, three social outcasts attempt to navigate a time-travel conundrum.

name: Henry: Portrait of a Serial Killer
summary_text: Arriving in Chicago, Henry 'Michael Rooker, in what is undoubtedly the finest performance of his patchy career', moves in with ex-con acquaintance Otis and starts schooling him in the ways of the serial killer.

name: Victoria & Abdul
summary_text: Queen Victoria strikes up an unlikely friendship with a young Indian clerk named Abdul Karim.

name: Sudden Death
summary_text: A former fireman takes on a group of terrorists holding the Vice President and others hostage during the seventh game of the NHL Stanley Cup finals.

name: Gummo
summary_text: Lonely residents of a tornado-stricken Ohio town wander the deserted landscape trying to fulfill their boring, nihilistic lives.

name: Altered States
summary_text: A psycho-physiologist experiments with drugs and a sensory-deprivation tank and has visions he believes are genetic memories.

name: Tokyo Godfathers
summary_text: On Christmas Eve, three homeless people living on the streets of Tokyo discover a newborn baby among the trash and set out to find its parents.

name: The Marine
summary_text: A group of diamond thieves on the run kidnap the wife of a recently discharged marine who goes on a chase through the South Carolinian wilderness to retrieve her.

name: The Phantom
summary_text: The Phantom, descendent of a line of African superheroes, travels to New York City to thwart a wealthy criminal genius from obtaining three magic skulls which would give him the secret to ultimate power.

name: A Little Princess
summary_text: A young girl is relegated to servitude at a boarding school when her father goes missing and is presumed dead.

name: True Crime
summary_text: Can an over-the-hill journalist uncover the evidence that can prove a death row inmate's innocence just hours before his execution?

name: Holmes & Watson
summary_text: A humorous take on Sir Arthur Conan Doyle's classic mysteries featuring Sherlock Holmes and Doctor Watson.

name: Ivan's Childhood
summary_text: During WWII, Soviet orphan Ivan Bondarev strikes up a friendship with three sympathetic Soviet officers while working as a scout behind the German lines.

name: Angel-A
summary_text: A beautiful woman helps an inept scam artist get his game together.

name: The Black Cauldron
summary_text: A young boy and a group of misfit friends embark on a quest to find a dark magic item of ultimate power before a diabolical tyrant can.

name: Escape from the Planet of the Apes
summary_text: The world is shocked by the appearance of three talking chimpanzees, who arrived mysteriously in a U.S. spacecraft. They become the toast of society, but one man believes them to be a threat to the human race.

name: Sweet and Lowdown
summary_text: In the 1930s, jazz guitarist Emmet Ray idolizes Django Reinhardt, faces gangsters and falls in love with a mute woman.

name: Che: Part Two
summary_text: In 1967, Ernesto 'Che' Guevara leads a small partisan army to fight an ill-fated revolutionary guerrilla war in Bolivia, South America.

name: Hard Rain
summary_text: The nephew of an armored-truck driver tries to prevent three million dollars from being taken by a local rival gang during a catastrophic flooding caused by a severe storm.

name: Mesrine: Killer Instinct
summary_text: The story of the notorious French gangster Jacques Mesrine, with the focus on his life before the early 1970s and the events that led to him being declared Public Enemy No. 1 in France.

name: Av Mevsimi
summary_text: The lives of three homicide detectives are turned upside-down during a murder investigation.

name: New Jack City
summary_text: A crime lord ascends to power and becomes megalomaniacal while a maverick police detective vows to stop him.

name: The Woodsman
summary_text: A child molester returns to his hometown after 12 years in prison and attempts to start a new life.

name: For Love of the Game
summary_text: After 19 years of playing the game he's loved his whole life, Detroit Tigers pitcher Billy Chapel has to decide if he's going to risk everything and put everything out there.

name: Loving
summary_text: The story of Richard and Mildred Loving, a couple whose arrest for interracial marriage in 1960s Virginia began a legal battle that would end with the Supreme Court's historic 1967 decision.

name: Exit Wounds
summary_text: Orin Boyd, a tough cop in an inner-city precinct discovers a web of dirty cops and corruption.

name: Unfinished Business
summary_text: A hard-working small business owner and his two associates travel to Europe to close the most important deal of their lives. But what began as a routine business trip goes off the rails in every way imaginable, and unimaginable.

name: Bill & Ted Face the Music
summary_text: Once told they'd save the universe during a time-traveling adventure, 2 would-be rockers from San Dimas, California find themselves as middle-aged dads still trying to crank out a hit song and fulfill their destiny.

name: Gentlemen Prefer Blondes
summary_text: Showgirls Lorelei Lee and Dorothy Shaw travel to Paris, pursued by a private detective hired by the suspicious father of Lorelei's fiancé, as well as a rich, enamored old man and many other doting admirers.

name: Dracula 2000
summary_text: A group of thieves breaks into a chamber expecting to find paintings, but instead they release the count himself, who travels to New Orleans to find his nemesis' daughter, Mary Van Helsing.

name: The Accused
summary_text: After a young woman suffers a brutal gang rape in a bar one night, a prosecutor assists in bringing the perpetrators to justice, including the ones who encouraged and cheered on the attack.

name: Housebound
summary_text: A young woman is forced to return to her childhood home after being placed under house arrest, where she suspects that something evil may be lurking.

name: The Sweet Hereafter
summary_text: A bus crash in a small town brings a lawyer to the town to defend the families, but he discovers that everything is not what it seems.

name: Man of the Year
summary_text: A comedian who hosts a news satire program decides to run for president, and a computerized voting machine malfunction gets him elected.

name: Welcome to the Punch
summary_text: When a notorious criminal is forced to return to London, it gives a detective one last chance to take down the man he's always been after.

name: Shortbus
summary_text: A group of New Yorkers caught up in their romantic-sexual milieu converge at an underground salon infamous for its blend of art, music, politics, and carnality.

name: Honest Thief
summary_text: Wanting to lead an honest life, a notorious bank robber turns himself in, only to be double-crossed by two ruthless FBI agents.

name: Pek Yakinda
summary_text: Pirated DVD seller Zafer who is formerly an extra in movies; swore to give up illegal works when his wife wanted to get divorce. To win his family back, he and his old-fashioned crew ...                See full summary »

name: Heavy Metal
summary_text: A glowing green orb - which embodies ultimate evil - terrorizes a young girl with an anthology of bizarre and fantastic stories of dark fantasy, eroticism and horror.

name: Dungeons & Dragons
summary_text: Profion, a tyrant, attempts to overthrow a peaceful kingdom ruled by a tough empress.

name: Hedwig and the Angry Inch
summary_text: A gender-queer punk-rock singer from East Berlin tours the U.S. with her band as she tells her life story and follows the former lover/band-mate who stole her songs.

name: The Stepfather
summary_text: Michael Harding (Penn Badgely) returns home from military school to find his mother Susan (Sela Ward) happily in love and living with her new boyfriend David (Dylan Walsh). As the two men get to know each other, he becomes more and more suspicious of the man who is always there with a helpful hand.

name: P2
summary_text: A businesswoman is pursued by a psychopath after being locked in a parking garage on Christmas Eve.

name: Ace in the Hole
summary_text: A frustrated former big-city journalist now stuck working for an Albuquerque newspaper exploits a story about a man trapped in a cave to rekindle his career, but the situation quickly escalates into an out-of-control circus.

name: Police Academy: Mission to Moscow
summary_text: The Russian government hires the veterans of the Police Academy (1984) to help deal with the Mafia.

name: Rumble Fish
summary_text: Absent-minded street thug Rusty James struggles to live up to his legendary older brother's reputation, and longs for the days of gang warfare.

name: Nefes: Vatan Sagolsun
summary_text: Story of 40-man Turkish task force who must defend a relay station.

name: Welcome to the Dollhouse
summary_text: An awkward seventh-grader struggles to cope with inattentive parents, snobbish class-mates, a smart older brother, an attractive younger sister and her own insecurities in suburban New Jersey.

name: Dragnet
summary_text: The equally-straight-laced and "by the book" nephew of Joe Friday must work with his more laid-back partner to solve a mystery.

name: Fitzcarraldo
summary_text: The story of Brian Sweeney Fitzgerald, an extremely determined man who intends to build an opera house in the middle of a jungle.

name: Muppets Most Wanted
summary_text: While on a grand world tour, The Muppets find themselves wrapped into an European jewel-heist caper headed by a Kermit the Frog look-alike and his dastardly sidekick.

name: Compliance
summary_text: A normal Friday service at a fast food restaurant becomes interrupted by a police officer who claims an employee stole from a customer, but something more sinister is going on.

name: Tideland
summary_text: Because of the actions of her irresponsible parents, a young girl is left alone on a decrepit country estate and survives inside her fantastic imagination.

name: Hop
summary_text: E.B., the Easter Bunny's teenage son, heads to Hollywood, determined to become a drummer in a rock 'n' roll band. In LA, he's taken in by Fred after the out-of-work slacker hits E.B. with his car.

name: Fighting
summary_text: In New York City, a young counterfeiter is introduced to the world of underground street fighting by a seasoned scam artist, who becomes his manager on the bare-knuckling brawling circuit.

name: Igby Goes Down
summary_text: A young man's peculiar upbringing renders him unable to competently cope with the struggle of growing up.

name: The Red Turtle
summary_text: A man is shipwrecked on a deserted island and encounters a red turtle, which changes his life.

name: Tora! Tora! Tora!
summary_text: The story of the 1941 Japanese air raid on Pearl Harbor, and the series of preceding American blunders that aggravated its effectiveness.

name: The Odd Couple
summary_text: Two friends try sharing an apartment, but their ideas of housekeeping and lifestyles are as different as night and day.

name: Alvin and the Chipmunks: Chipwrecked
summary_text: Playing around while aboard a cruise ship, the Chipmunks and Chipettes accidentally go overboard and end up marooned in a tropical paradise. They discover their new turf is not as deserted as it seems.

name: Peeping Tom
summary_text: A young man murders women, using a movie camera to film their dying expressions of terror.

name: Instinct
summary_text: When noted anthropologist Dr. Ethan Powell, who left society to live in the jungle is imprisoned for murder, it's up to young psychiatrist Theo Caulder to get through to him.

name: A Girl Walks Home Alone at Night
summary_text: In the Iranian ghost-town Bad City, a place that reeks of death and loneliness, the townspeople are unaware they are being stalked by a lonesome vampire.

name: The Whistleblower
summary_text: A drama based on the experiences of Kathryn Bolkovac, a Nebraska cop who served as a peacekeeper in post-war Bosnia and outed the U.N. for covering up a sex trafficking scandal.

name: The Void
summary_text: Shortly after delivering a patient to an understaffed hospital, a police officer experiences strange and violent occurrences seemingly linked to a group of mysterious hooded figures.

name: A Walk in the Clouds
summary_text: A married soldier returning from World War II poses as a pregnant woman's husband to save her from her father's anger and honor.

name: Where the Heart Is
summary_text: A pregnant seventeen-year-old rebuilds her life after being abandoned by her boyfriend at a Walmart in Sequoyah, Oklahoma.

name: Radio Days
summary_text: A nostalgic look at radio's golden age focusing on one ordinary family and the various performers in the medium.

name: The Way of the Gun
summary_text: Two criminal drifters without sympathy get more than they bargained for after kidnapping and holding for ransom the surrogate mother of a powerful and shady man.

name: The Grandmaster
summary_text: The story of martial-arts master Ip Man, the man who trained Bruce Lee.

name: The Shipping News
summary_text: An emotionally beaten man with his young daughter moves to his ancestral home in Newfoundland to reclaim his life.

name: A Man for All Seasons
summary_text: The story of Sir Thomas More, who stood up to King Henry VIII when the King rejected the Roman Catholic Church to obtain a divorce and remarry.

name: Double Team
summary_text: An international spy teams up with an arms dealer to escape from a penal colony and rescue his family from a terrorist.

name: The Company You Keep
summary_text: After a journalist discovers his identity, a former Weather Underground activist goes on the run.

name: Upstream Color
summary_text: A man and woman are drawn together, entangled in the life cycle of an ageless organism. Identity becomes an illusion as they struggle to assemble the loose fragments of wrecked lives.

name: *batteries not included
summary_text: Aliens help a feisty old New York couple in their battle against the ruthless land developer who's out to evict them.

name: Ghost Stories
summary_text: Skeptical professor Phillip Goodman embarks on a trip to the terrifying after being given a file with details of three unexplained cases of apparitions.

name: The Hate U Give
summary_text: Starr witnesses the fatal shooting of her childhood best friend Khalil at the hands of a police officer. Now, facing pressure from all sides of the community, Starr must find her voice and stand up for what's right.

name: K-9
summary_text: To stop an elusive criminal, a maverick detective enlists the aid of a police dog who's an unusually intelligent smart alec.

name: Dilwale
summary_text: The siblings of two estranged lovers fall for each other, unaware of the violent past that drove them apart.

name: Flypaper
summary_text: A man caught in the middle of two simultaneous robberies at the same bank desperately tries to protect the teller with whom he's secretly in love.

name: Babe: Pig in the City
summary_text: Babe, fresh from his victory in the sheepherding contest, returns to Farmer Hoggett's farm, but after Farmer Hoggett is injured and unable to work, Babe has to go to the big city to save the farm.

name: Blues Brothers 2000
summary_text: Elwood must reunite the old band, with a few new members, and go on another "Mission from God."

name: Once Were Warriors
summary_text: A family descended from Maori warriors is bedeviled by a violent father and the societal problems of being treated as outcasts.

name: The Red Violin
summary_text: A red-colored violin inspires passion, making its way through three centuries over several owners and countries, eventually ending up at an auction where it may find a new owner.

name: The People Under the Stairs
summary_text: Two adults and a juvenile break into a house occupied by a brother and sister and their stolen children. There, they must fight for their lives.

name: Halloween: The Curse of Michael Myers
summary_text: Six years after Michael Myers last terrorized Haddonfield, he returns there in pursuit of his niece, Jamie Lloyd, who has escaped with her newborn child, for which Michael and a mysterious cult have sinister plans.

name: The Second Best Exotic Marigold Hotel
summary_text: As the Best Exotic Marigold Hotel has only a single remaining vacancy, posing a rooming predicament for two fresh arrivals, Sonny Kapoor (Dev Patel) pursues his expansionist dream of opening a second hotel.

name: Harry and the Hendersons
summary_text: The Henderson family adopt a friendly Sasquatch but have a hard time trying to keep the legend of 'Bigfoot' a secret.

name: The Open House
summary_text: A teenager and his mother find themselves besieged by threatening forces when they move into a new house.

name: IO
summary_text: As a young scientist searches for a way to save a dying Earth, she finds a connection with a man who's racing to catch the last shuttle off the planet.

name: Survivor
summary_text: A Foreign Service Officer in London tries to prevent a terrorist attack set to hit New York City, but is forced to go on the run when she is framed for crimes she did not commit.

name: Love Story
summary_text: A boy and a girl from different backgrounds fall in love regardless of their upbringing - and then tragedy strikes.

name: Bajirao Mastani
summary_text: An account of the romance between the Maratha general, Baji Rao I and Mastani, princess of Bundelkhand.

name: The Howling
summary_text: After a bizarre and near deadly encounter with a serial killer, a television newswoman is sent to a remote mountain resort whose residents may not be what they seem.

name: Raw Deal
summary_text: A former FBI agent turned small-town sheriff agrees to help the FBI chief infiltrate the Chicago mafia when the FBI chief's son is killed by them.

name: Talvar
summary_text: An experienced investigator confronts several conflicting theories about the perpetrators of a violent double homicide.

name: Chaos Theory
summary_text: The story of an obsessively organized efficiency expert whose life unravels in unexpected ways when fate forces him to explore the serendipitous nature of love and forgiveness.
The famous 1970s New York City nightclub seen and told through the eyes of a young employee.

name: Au Revoir les Enfants
summary_text: A French boarding school run by priests seems to be a haven from World War II until a new student arrives. He becomes the roommate of the top student in his class. Rivals at first, the roommates form a bond and share a secret.

name: The Final Cut
summary_text: Set in a world with memory recording implants, Alan Hakman is a cutter, someone with the power of final edit over people's recorded histories. His latest assignment is one that puts him in danger.
Hysterical Californians prepare for a Japanese invasion in the days after Pearl Harbor.

name: Goal II: Living the Dream
summary_text: When Newcastle United soccer star Santiago Muñez (Kuno Becker) is offered a spot with Real Madrid, he accepts, but the move - accompanied by big money and fame - tests his ties and loyalties to family, friends, and business acquaintances.

name: Mute
summary_text: A mute bartender goes up against his city's gangsters in an effort to find out what happened to his missing partner.

name: All the Boys Love Mandy Lane
summary_text: A group of high-schoolers invite Mandy Lane, an innocent, desirable girl, to a weekend party on a secluded ranch. While the festivities rage on, the number of revelers begins to drop mysteriously.

name: Young Guns II
summary_text: In 1881, cattle baron John Chisum pays a bounty to Patrick Floyd Garrett to kill outlaw Billy the Kid.

name: Choke
summary_text: A sex-addicted con-man pays for his mother's hospital bills by playing on the sympathies of those who rescue him from choking to death.

name: C.R.A.Z.Y.
summary_text: A young French-Canadian, growing up in the 1960s and 1970s, struggles to reconcile his emerging homosexuality with his father's conservative values and his own Catholic beliefs.

name: Blood and Bone
summary_text: In Los Angeles, an ex-con takes the underground fighting world by storm in his quest to fulfill a promise to a dead friend.

name: Beautiful Girls
summary_text: A piano player at a crossroads in his life returns home to his friends and their own problems with life and love.

name: The Red Shoes
summary_text: A young ballet dancer is torn between the man she loves and her pursuit to become a prima ballerina.

name: If Only
summary_text: It takes a tragedy to teach the young businessman Ian to put love ahead of work and open up to his musician girlfriend Samantha.

name: Big Game
summary_text: A young teenager camping in the woods helps rescue the President of the United States when Air Force One is shot down near his campsite.

name: To Have and Have Not
summary_text: During World War II, American expatriate Harry Morgan helps transport a French Resistance leader and his beautiful wife to Martinique while romancing a sensuous lounge singer.

name: Critters
summary_text: A group of small but vicious alien creatures called Crites escape from an alien prison transport vessel and land near a small farm town on earth, pursued by two shape-shifting bounty hunters.

name: Love Happens
summary_text: A widower whose book about coping with loss turns him into a best-selling self-help guru, falls for the hotel florist where his seminar is given, only to learn that he hasn't yet truly confronted his wife's passing.

name: Sin Nombre
summary_text: A Honduran young girl and a Mexican gangster are united in a journey across the American border.

name: And Justice for All
summary_text: A lawyer is forced to defend a guilty judge, while defending other innocent clients, and trying to find punishment for the guilty and provide justice for the innocent.

name: Pathology
summary_text: A group of medical students devise a deadly game: to see which one of them can commit the perfect murder.

name: Oliver Twist
summary_text: An adaptation of the classic Dickens tale, where an orphan meets a pickpocket on the streets of London. From there, he joins a household of boys who are trained to steal for their master.

name: The Captive
summary_text: Eight years after the disappearance of Cassandra, some disturbing incidents seem to indicate that she's still alive. Police, parents and Cassandra herself, will try to unravel the mystery of her disappearance.

name: The Legend Is Born: Ip Man
summary_text: Yip Man's resistance against invading foreigners, along with his romantic relations while under the tutelage of three Wing Chun masters.

name: 45 Years
summary_text: A married couple preparing to celebrate their wedding anniversary receives shattering news that promises to forever change the course of their lives.

name: Anand
summary_text: The story of a terminally ill man who wishes to live life to the fullest before the inevitable occurs, as told by his best friend.

name: The Island of Dr. Moreau
summary_text: After being rescued and brought to an island, a man discovers that its inhabitants are experimental animals being turned into strange-looking humans, all of it the work of a visionary doctor.

name: A Long Way Down
summary_text: Four people meet on New Year's Eve, and form a surrogate family to help one another with the difficulties of their lives.

name: Body Heat
summary_text: In the midst of a searing Florida heat wave, a woman persuades her lover, a small-town lawyer, to murder her rich husband.

name: Magic Carpet Ride
summary_text: A struggling, suicidal young comedian meets a car thief who is willing to teach him a few things about his profession.

name: Stalingrad
summary_text: The story follows a group of German soldiers, from their Italian R&R in the summer of 1942 to the frozen steppes of Soviet Russia and ending with the battle for Stalingrad.

name: Marshland
summary_text: Two cops lost in the deep south of Spain. One serial killer to catch. A lot of secrets and lies to disclose.

name: To Be or Not to Be
summary_text: During the Nazi occupation of Poland, an acting troupe becomes embroiled in a Polish soldier's efforts to track down a German spy.

name: White Boy Rick
summary_text: The story of teenager Richard Wershe Jr., who became an undercover informant for the FBI during the 1980s and was ultimately arrested for drug-trafficking and sentenced to life in prison.

name: Melinda and Melinda
summary_text: Two alternating stories, one comedy and the other tragedy, about Melinda's attempts to straighten out her life.

name: 99 Homes
summary_text: A recently unemployed single father struggles to get back his foreclosed home by working for the real estate broker who is the source of his frustration.

name: Sleeping Beauty
summary_text: A haunting portrait of Lucy, a young university student drawn into a mysterious hidden world of unspoken desires.

name: The Vast of Night
summary_text: One night in New Mexico, in the late 1950s, a switchboard operator and radio DJ discover a strange audio frequency which could change the future forever.

name: Jimmy Neutron: Boy Genius
summary_text: An eight-year-old boy genius and his friends must rescue their parents after the adults are abducted by aliens.

name: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles III
summary_text: When their closest friend April O'Neil discovers an ancient scepter with magical powers, the turtles must cow-a-bunga their way back to 17th century Japan to rescue her from the evil clutches of Lord Norinaga.

name: The Invisible Man
summary_text: A scientist finds a way of becoming invisible, but in doing so, he becomes murderously insane.

name: Winchester
summary_text: Ensconced in her sprawling San Jose, California mansion, eccentric firearm heiress Sarah Winchester (Dame Helen Mirren) believes she is haunted by the souls of people killed by the Winchester repeating rifle.

name: The Shack
summary_text: A grieving man receives a mysterious, personal invitation to meet with God at a place called "The Shack."

name: The Homesman
summary_text: Three women who have been driven mad by pioneer life are to be transported across the country by covered wagon by the pious, independent-minded Mary Bee Cuddy, who in turn employs low-life drifter George Briggs to assist her.

name: Leatherheads
summary_text: In 1925, an enterprising pro football player convinces America's too-good-to-be-true college football hero to play for his team and keep the league from going under.

name: Coriolanus
summary_text: A banished hero of Rome allies with a sworn enemy to take his revenge on the city.

name: Major Payne
summary_text: A recently discharged Major finds himself commanding a group of mismatched Cadets.

name: Fanaa
summary_text: A sweet blind girl Zooni meets a flirty Rehan. She ignores her friends' warnings. It's her time to discover life. Is she making the right love choice?

name: Chasing Mavericks
summary_text: When young Jay Moriarity discovers that the mythic Mavericks surf break, one of the biggest waves on Earth, exists just miles from his Santa Cruz home, he enlists the help of local legend Frosty Hesson to train him to survive it.

name: The Boy Who Harnessed the Wind
summary_text: Against all the odds, a thirteen-year-old boy in Malawi invents an unconventional way to save his family and village from famine.

name: The Skulls
summary_text: A senior at an ivy league college, who depends on scholarships and working on the side, gets accepted into the secret society The Skulls. He hopes it betters chances at Harvard but The Skulls is not what he thought and comes at a price.

name: One Missed Call
summary_text: Several people start receiving voice-mails from their future selves - messages which include the date, time, and some of the details of their deaths.

name: The Way
summary_text: A father heads overseas to recover the body of his estranged son who died while traveling the "El camino de Santiago," and decides to take the pilgrimage himself.

name: Priceless
summary_text: Through a set of wacky circumstances, a young gold digger mistakenly woos a mild-mannered bartender, thinking he's a wealthy suitor.

name: Camp Rock
summary_text: At a music camp for gifted teens, a popular teen idol overhears a girl singing and sets out to find who the talented voice belongs to. What he doesn't know is that the girl is actually a camp kitchen worker with a fear of being heard.

name: Unlocked
summary_text: A CIA interrogator is lured into a ruse that puts London at risk of a biological attack.

name: Troll 2
summary_text: A vacationing family discovers that the entire town they're visiting is inhabited by goblins, disguised as humans, who plan to eat them.

name: In the Land of Women
summary_text: A sleazy writer has a chance to redeem himself when he goes to stay with his grandmother and befriends the neighbors.

name: The Edge of Heaven
summary_text: A Turkish man travels to Istanbul to find the daughter of his father's former girlfriend.

name: The Hills Have Eyes
summary_text: On the way to California, a family has the misfortune to have their car break down in an area closed to the public, and inhabited by violent savages ready to attack.

name: In a World...
summary_text: An underachieving voice coach finds herself competing in the movie trailer voice-over profession against her arrogant father and his protégé.

name: An American in Paris
summary_text: Three friends struggle to find work in Paris. Things become more complicated when two of them fall in love with the same woman.

name: Men, Women & Children
summary_text: A group of high school teenagers and their parents attempt to navigate the many ways the Internet has changed their relationships, their communications, their self-images, and their love lives.

name: Hokkabaz
summary_text: Failed magician Iskender decides to do a tour to save his career, but has to bring his grumpy and senile father along. The tour is quite unexpectedly interrupted when a bride actually disappears from the stage.

name: Son of Rambow
summary_text: During a long English summer in the early 1980s, two schoolboys from differing backgrounds set out to make a film inspired by First Blood (1982).

name: A Night at the Opera
summary_text: A sly business manager and two wacky friends of two opera singers help them achieve success while humiliating their stuffy and snobbish enemies.

name: The Edukators
summary_text: Three activists cobble together a kidnapping plot after they encounter a businessman in his home.

name: Cries & Whispers
summary_text: When a woman dying of cancer in early twentieth-century Sweden is visited by her two sisters, long-repressed feelings between the siblings rise to the surface.

name: Cop Car
summary_text: A small-town sheriff sets out to find the two kids who have taken his car on a joy ride.

name: Must Love Dogs
summary_text: A thirty-something preschool teacher looks to the personals for a change of pace and a relationship, with hilarious results.

name: The Circus
summary_text: The Tramp finds work and the girl of his dreams at a circus.

name: The Changeling
summary_text: After the death of his wife and daughter in a car crash, a music professor staying at an old mansion is dragged into a decades-old mystery by an inexplicable presence in the mansion's attic.

name: The Man Who Knew Too Little
summary_text: Wallace Ritchie is mistaken for a spy and must stop a plot to assassinate international leaders at a banquet.

name: Real Genius
summary_text: Teenage geniuses deal with their abilities while developing a high-powered laser for a university project. When their professor intends to turn their work into a military weapon, they decide to ruin his plans.

name: Abominable
summary_text: Three teenagers must help a Yeti return to his family while avoiding a wealthy man and a zoologist who want him for their own needs.

name: Cursed
summary_text: A werewolf loose in Los Angeles changes the lives of three young adults who, after being mauled by the beast, learn they must kill it in order to avoid becoming werewolves themselves.

name: Mean Creek
summary_text: When a teen is bullied, his brother and friends lure the bully into the woods to seek revenge.

name: Hysteria
summary_text: The truth of how Mortimer Granville devised the invention of the first vibrator in the name of medical science.

name: Toys
summary_text: When Lieutenant General Leland Zevo (Sir Michael Gambon) inherits a toymaking company and begins making war toys, his employees band together to stop him before he ruins the name of Zevo Toys forever.

name: Time Trap
summary_text: A professor enters a cave and goes missing. Some of his students come looking for him and get trapped in the cave as well.

name: City Island
summary_text: Prison guard Vince tells Molly from acting class, that one inmate is his 24 y.o. love child. Vince takes him home to stay with his family - straight A son with fat girl fetish, college dropout/stripper daughter and cute wife.

name: Krull
summary_text: A prince and a fellowship of companions set out to rescue his bride from a fortress of alien invaders who have arrived on their home planet.

name: Duck You Sucker
summary_text: A low-life bandit and an I.R.A. explosives expert rebel against the government and become heroes of the Mexican Revolution.

name: Stay Alive
summary_text: For a group of teens, the answer to the mysterious death of their old friend lies within the world of an online video game based on the true story of an ancient noblewoman known as the Blood Countess.

name: Sleuth
summary_text: On his sprawling country estate, an aging writer matches wits with the struggling actor who has stolen his wife's heart.

name: Shattered
summary_text: A perfect family's dynamic is ruined by a kidnapper's brutally efficient plot.

name: Police Story
summary_text: A virtuous Hong Kong Police Officer must clear his good name when the drug lord he is after frames him for the murder of a dirty cop.

name: Late Night
summary_text: A late night talk show host suspects that she may soon lose her long-running show.

name: Tyrannosaur
summary_text: Joseph, a man plagued by violence and a rage that is driving him to self-destruction, earns a chance of redemption that appears in the form of Hannah, a Christian charity shop worker.

name: The Glass Castle
summary_text: A young girl comes of age in a dysfunctional family of nonconformist nomads with a mother who's an eccentric artist and an alcoholic father who would stir the children's imagination with hope as a distraction to their poverty.

name: The Limey
summary_text: An extremely volatile and dangerous Englishman goes to Los Angeles to find the man he considers responsible for his daughter's death.

name: Maximum Overdrive
summary_text: A group of people try to survive when machines start to come alive and become homicidal.

name: The Discovery
summary_text: Two years after the afterlife is scientifically proven, a man attempts to help a young woman break away from her dark past.

name: Loveless
summary_text: A couple going through a divorce must team up to find their son who has disappeared during one of their bitter arguments.

name: To All the Boys: P.S. I Still Love You
summary_text: Lara Jean and Peter have just taken their relationship from pretend to officially official when another recipient of one of her old love letters enters the picture.

name: In the House
summary_text: A high school French teacher is drawn into a precocious student's increasingly transgressive story about his relationship with a friend's family.
